entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with rain. Low zero except minus 3 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of freezing rain. Freezing rain or rain before morning. Low zero except minus 3 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain changing to rain in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
